Atomic swaps use Hash Time-Locked Contra: Atomic swaps use Hash Time-Locked Contracts (HTLCs) to ensure that either both parties receive their funds, or nobody does. This cryptographic mechanism eliminates counterparty risk. There is no way for one party to cheat the other.
